name: Michi
description:
Introducing Michi, an engaging and innovative game that blends the strategic deck-building elements of Slay the Spire, the intense auto-battling of Teamfight Tactics, and the adorable charm of Super Auto Pets. Assemble your ultimate Aibo team, draft powerful cards, and guide them through fierce battles against other Aibos in a thrilling journey to conquer the towering challenge that lies ahead.

Venture through 20 captivating floors, each presenting a unique challenge as you choose from easy, medium, or hard encounters, all leading to the ultimate showdown against a formidable boss. Along the way, combine your Aibos to evolve them into mightier forms, and collect valuable artifacts to bolster your team's prowess in future battles.

Features:


- Draft and build your Aibo deck, selecting from a diverse array of creatures with distinct abilities and synergies.

- Engage in exhilarating auto-battles against other Aibos, strategically placing your team members to achieve victory.

- Choose your path through a multi-tiered tower, with each door offering varying levels of difficulty and rewards.

- Evolve your Aibos by combining them, unlocking their full potential as they grow in power and complexity.

- Collect and equip artifacts discovered throughout your journey, enhancing your team's capabilities for future battles.


Embark on an enthralling adventure in Michi, where strategic thinking, decisive choices, and the bonds you form with your Aibos will determine your ultimate success. Dare to climb the tower and emerge victorious in this captivating world of Michi!
